pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ denti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.6_1: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā amhākaṁ pahāraṁ dentī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ dassantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:1.15.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṁ dadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.1.10_0: kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā antamaso uppalapattenapi pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.2.1_0: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.2.2_0: Upasampanne vematiko kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.2.3_0: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc74:2.2.4_0: Anupasampannassa kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
